response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by its creators, but I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 14500}
